# spawnSpreadFactor

**Instance Property**

Amount a spawned particle spreads away from its parent particle, works in conjunction with the spawn particle’s `spreadingAngle`. Defaults to 0.

## Declaration

```swift
var spawnSpreadFactor: Float
```
title: spawnSpreadFactor
